newsitem.title: USA: American Eagle Group completes financing.
newsitem.headline: American Eagle Group completes financing.

text.p: American Eagle Group Inc said late Tuesday that its stockholders had approved the previously announced $35 million capital investment by American Financial Group Inc in American Eagle convertible preferred stock.
This transaction was closed following the approval at the stockholders' meeting.
American Eagle said it used the net proceeds from the transaction to add $17 million to the statutory surplus of the company's principal operating subsidiary, American Eagle Insurance Co.
The company also used proceeds to retire its existing revolving credit facility, against which $13.25 million had previously been outstanding.
The rest will be used for other general corporate purposes, it said.
